section.title: BibleTime Development mailing list
section.para: To subscribe to the development mailing list of the BibleTime project please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there: www.crosswire.org/mailman/listinfo/bt-devel. This list is intended for use by all interested individuals, and is a good place to start to contact the developers or ask general questions.
Archives of the BibleTime development mailing list are available at www.crosswire.org/pipermail/bt-devel.

section.title: BibleTime Translations mailing list
section.para: To subscribe to the BibleTime Translations mailing list please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there: lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/bibletime-translations. This list is intended for translators to submit their work, and ask questions regarding translations.

section.title: BibleTime commit log mailing list
section.para: To subscribe to the BibleTime commit log mailing list please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there: lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/bibletime-cvs. This list is intended for use by all interested individuals to monitor the work of the BibleTime developers.

section.title: BibleTime Packaging mailing list
section.para:
To subscribe to the BibleTime Packagers mailing list please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there:
lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/bibletime-packaging. This list is intended for discussion and announcements to BibleTime Packagers and other interested individuals.

section.title: BibleTime Tracker mailing list
section.para:
To subscribe to the BibleTime Tracker mailing list please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there:
lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/bibletime-tracker. This list is intended for anybody interested in following the Bug Reports and Feature requests that are logged for the BibleTime Developers.

section.title: Sword development mailing list
section.para: To subscribe to the development mailing list of the Sword project please visit the following web page and enter your eMail address there: www.crosswire.org/mailman/listinfo/sword-devel.
Archives of the Sword development mailing list are available at www.crosswire.org/pipermail/sword-devel.
